titleStmt.title: 李约瑟博士的摄影——战时的中国 (1942-1946), 敦煌千佛洞
A Catalogue of Joseph Needham's Photographs — Wartime China (1942-1946), the Thousand Buddha Caves at Dunhuang
titleStmt.author: 罗华庆
Luo Huaqing

head.p: A catalogue of photographs of the Mogao Caves and surrounding areas, taken by Joseph Needham during his visit to Dunhuang in 1943.
Translated by Shaochen Wang and Na Zhang (UCL).

note.p: 敦煌城东12公里处五墩
Five Beacon Towers, 12 km east of Dunhuang
